extendedInfo.description: AudioPlayer is a compact audio player for Android Smartphone/tablet. Playing audio books, classical music or any music of your choice.AudioPlayer is an ideal player, when you wish to organize your audio files in a directory and create your own playlists.AudioPlayer can play audio files compatible with your device.As an indication AudioPlayer plays:  MP3, AMR, AAC, PCM WAV, OGG, MP4a, 3GP and playlists done in M3U.AudioPlayer can:- play your own playlists including a shuffle mode.- support for nested playlists (up to 16 levels)- Show ID2V1 and ID3V2 datas (title, artist, album, description).- Go back or forward in your lists.- Go forward on a small/medium/large (adjustable) jump along the track.- Play in a loop mode.- Store playback settings when there is a shutdown (playlists, track/chapter, play position, and volume). It starts where you stopped.- Activate a pause mode during in-outgoing calls.AudioPlayer is also available for purchase if you wish an ads free version!!!! The right for reading the telephone status is only needed for going in pause during in- or outgoing calls !!!

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Through did not figure out yet how to select entire folder for playback. Would be ideal
reviews.author: Dmitro Lisnichenko

reviews.title: perfect!
reviews.comment: it supports amr! while most player dont! kudos to the developer..keep up the good work
reviews.author: jackie santoceldes

reviews.title: You don\'t have to drag
reviews.comment: The only player I found where you could skip specified chunks of time with buttons rather than dragging. Great for large files, and finding my place in an audiobook. Wish it could handle video. One star off because it often starts files from the middle when more than one file is loaded.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: G.G.., x.o.x.o
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t  work on my \"my touch\" lame!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: where is usb storage?
reviews.comment: /mnt/sdcard is not the only storage space on Android devices....we also have USB storage....but if there\'s a way to get there in this app, it\'s well hidden.  useless, uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I was searching for an app that i could play my. amr file from a previous app that i can no longer find. This gave me the option to search for my file

reviews.title: Doesn\'t play WAV files
reviews.comment: The file browser interface is nice, and it seems like this would be a great player, but alas, it doesn\'t get the job done. Device info: Samsung Infuse Android 2.2 Froyo AT&T

reviews.comment: The most clean sound and simple media player.  Designed for Djs like myself,  that apreciates quality but demans simplicity.

reviews.title: It won\'t play AMRs from Evernote
reviews.comment: It can\'t play AMRs.  Well, those from Evernote anyway.  The ones it can play...just produces white noise.
